snippet: A video of an American held captive for four and a half years has been obtained by the U.S. government, and officials said that it showed him in declining health.
abstract: Video of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl, American soldier held captive by Afghan insurgents for the past four and a half years, is in the possession of United States government and officials say that it shows him alive but in declining health.
lead_paragraph: A video of an American held captive for four and a half years has been obtained by the U.S. government, and officials said that it showed him in declining health.

headline.main: Video Shows U.S. Soldier Long Held by Afghans
headline.print_headline: Video Shows U.S. Soldier Long Held by Afghans
